languages.text: "Гравитация не щадит рожденных в пустоте. Но это не значит, что они не способны приспособиться к ней. Жизнь на столичном мире — достаточная награда, ради которой стоит постараться".

traits.locale_text: "Гравитация не щадит тех, кто был рожден в пустоте. Но это не значит, что они не способны приспособиться к новым условиям жизни".

languages.text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."
languages.original_text: "Гравитация не щадит рожденных в пустоте. Но это не значит, что они не способны приспособиться к ней. Жизнь на столичном мире — достаточная награда, ради которой стоит постараться".

traits.locale_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is enough of a reward to put in some effort for."
"Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is enough of a reward to put in some effort for."
"Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."
"Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."
"Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."
"Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."

languages.text: « Les hors-monde ont le plus grand mal à supporter la gravité. Mais ça ne veut pas pour autant dire qu'ils sont incapables de s'y adapter. Vivre sur le monde-capitale est une récompense qui vaut la peine de faire ce genre d'efforts. »
languages.original_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."

traits.locale_text: « Les enfants du vide ont le plus grand mal à supporter la gravité. Mais ça ne veut pas pour autant dire qu'ils sont incapables de s'y adapter. Vivre sur le monde-capitale est une récompense qui vaut la peine de faire ce genre d'efforts. »

languages.text: «La gravedad es cruel con los nacidos en el vacío, pero eso no significa que no puedan adaptarse a ella. Vivir en el mundo capital es una recompensa que merece el esfuerzo».
languages.original_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."

traits.locale_text: «La gravedad es cruel con los nacidos en el vacío, pero eso no significa que no puedan adaptarse a ella. Vivir en el mundo capital es una recompensa que merece el esfuerzo».

languages.text: 「重力は虚空生まれに容赦なく襲いかかります。しかし、だからといって順応できないわけではありません。首都惑星で生きるということは、そのために全力で努力したくなるほどの褒美なのです」
languages.original_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."

traits.locale_text: 「重力は虚空生まれに容赦なく襲いかかります。しかし、だからといって順応できないわけではありません。首都惑星で生きるということは、そのために全力で努力したくなる褒美なのです」

languages.text: “对虚空之子而言，重力是个巨大的障碍，但这并不意味着他们无法适应。只要能生活在首都世界，这样的回报便值得他们为之努力奋斗。”
languages.original_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."

traits.locale_text: “对虚空之子而言，重力是个巨大的障碍，但这并不意味着他们无法适应。只要能生活在首都世界，这样的回报便值得他们为之努力奋斗。”

languages.text: "Die Gravitation ist gnadenlos zu den Kindern der Leere. Das heißt aber nicht, dass sie sich nicht daran anpassen können. Ein Leben auf der Hauptwelt ist eine Belohnung, für die sich diese Mühe lohnt."
languages.original_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gravitation ist gnadenlos zu den Kindern der Leere. Das heißt aber nicht, dass sie sich nicht daran anpassen können. Ein Leben auf der Hauptwelt ist eine Belohnung, für die sich diese Mühe lohnt."

languages.text: "Yer çekimi, uçsuzdoğanlara merhamet etmez. Lakin bu, yer çekimine uyum sağlayamayacakları manasına gelmiyor. Başdünyada yaşamak, bu çabayı göstermeye layık bir ödül."
languages.original_text: "Gravity is merciless to the voidborn. But that does not mean they are incapable of adapting to it. Living on the capital world is a reward worth putting in the effort for."
